CustomField.description: Default credit officer code to be used if a mapping doesn't exist in Sales_Team_Segment__c reference data. Credit officer mappings are configured in Sales_Team_Segment__c for the sales team segment assigned to the customer organisation. Currently this is being used for StarTrack billing accounts (TEAM) only.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Default credit officer code to be used if a mapping doesn't exist in Sales_Team_Segment__c reference data.
CustomField.label: Default Credit Code
